Module FFMpeg::VideoAdvancedOptions
In: lib/ffmpeg/video_advanced_options.rb

Methods

b_frame_factor   b_frame_offset   b_frames   calculate_psnr   dct_algorithm   deinterlace   dump_video_statistics   enable_advanced_intra_coding   enable_unlimited_motion_vector   error_concealment   error_resilience   group_of_pictures_size   i_frame_factor   i_frame_offset   idct_algorithm   initial_complexity   interlacing_support   macroblock_decision_mode   motion_estimation_method   pixel_format   rate_control_equation   rate_control_override   show_qp_histogram   strictness   swscaler_flags   use_data_partitioning   use_four_motion_vector   use_only_intra_frames   video_bitstream_filter   video_discard_threshold   video_maximum_lagrange_factor   video_maximum_macroblock_scale   video_maximum_quantizer_difference   video_maximum_quantizer_scale   video_minimum_lagrange_factor   video_minimum_macroblock_scale   video_minimum_quantizer_scale   video_quantizer_scale   video_quantizer_scale_blur   video_quantizer_scale_compression  

Public Instance methods

b_frame_factor(factor)

Use qp factor between P- and B-frames

b_frame_offset(offset)

Use qp offset between P- and B-frames

b_frames(frames)

Use ‘frames’ B-frames (supported for MPEG-1, MPEG-2 and MPEG-4).

calculate_psnr()

Calculate PSNR of compressed frames.

dct_algorithm(algorithm)

Set DCT algorithm to algo. Available values are: 

  `0' FF_DCT_AUTO (default)
  `1' FF_DCT_FASTINT
  `2' FF_DCT_INT
  `3' FF_DCT_MMX
  `4' FF_DCT_MLIB
  `5' FF_DCT_ALTIVEC
deinterlace()

Deinterlace pictures.

dump_video_statistics(file = nil)

Dump video coding statistics to `vstats_HHMMSS.log’ or the supplied file.

enable_advanced_intra_coding()

Enable Advanced intra coding (h263+).

enable_unlimited_motion_vector()

Enable Unlimited Motion Vector (h263+)

error_concealment(mask)

Set error concealment to bit_mask. bit_mask is a bit mask of the following values: 

  `1' FF_EC_GUESS_MVS (default = enabled)
  `2' FF_EC_DEBLOCK (default = enabled)
error_resilience(number)

Set error resilience to n. 

  `1' FF_ER_CAREFUL (default)
  `2' FF_ER_COMPLIANT
  `3' FF_ER_AGGRESSIVE
  `4' FF_ER_VERY_AGGRESSIVE
group_of_pictures_size(size)

Set the group of pictures size.

i_frame_factor(factor)

Use qp factor between P- and I-frames

i_frame_offset(offset)

Use qp offset between P- and I-frames

idct_algorithm(algorithm)

Set IDCT algorithm to algo. Available values are: 

  `0' FF_IDCT_AUTO (default)
  `1' FF_IDCT_INT
  `2' FF_IDCT_SIMPLE
  `3' FF_IDCT_SIMPLEMMX
  `4' FF_IDCT_LIBMPEG2MMX
  `5' FF_IDCT_PS2
  `6' FF_IDCT_MLIB
  `7' FF_IDCT_ARM
  `8' FF_IDCT_ALTIVEC
  `9' FF_IDCT_SH4
  `10' FF_IDCT_SIMPLEARM
initial_complexity(complexity)

Use initial complexity for single pass encoding

interlacing_support()

Force interlacing support in encoder (MPEG-2 and MPEG-4 only). Use this option if your input file is interlaced and you want to keep the interlaced format for minimum losses. The alternative is to deinterlace the input stream with `-deinterlace’, but deinterlacing introduces losses.

macroblock_decision_mode(mode)

Macroblock decision mode 

  `0' FF_MB_DECISION_SIMPLE: Use mb_cmp (cannot change it yet in FFmpeg).
  `1' FF_MB_DECISION_BITS: Choose the one which needs the fewest bits.
  `2' FF_MB_DECISION_RD: rate distortion
motion_estimation_method(method)

Set motion estimation method to method. Available methods are (from lowest to best quality): 

  `zero' - Try just the (0, 0) vector.
  `phods'
  `log'
  `x1'
  `hex'
  `umh'
  `epzs' - (default method)
  `full' - exhaustive search (slow and marginally better than epzs)
pixel_format(format)

Set pixel format. Use ‘list’ as parameter to show all the supported pixel formats.

rate_control_equation(equation)

Set rate control equation (see section 3.11 FFmpeg formula evaluator) (default = tex^qComp).

rate_control_override(override)

Set rate control override for specific intervals

show_qp_histogram()

Show QP histogram.

strictness(strictness)

How strictly to follow the standards.

swscaler_flags(flags)

Set SwScaler flags (only available when compiled with swscale support).

use_data_partitioning()

Use data partitioning (MPEG-4 only).

use_four_motion_vector()

Use four motion vector by macroblock (MPEG-4 only).

use_only_intra_frames()

Use only intra frames.

video_bitstream_filter(filter)

Bitstream filters available are "dump_extra", "remove_extra", "noise", "h264_mp4toannexb", "imxdump" and "mjpegadump".

video_discard_threshold(number)

Discard threshold.

video_maximum_lagrange_factor(lambda)

Use max video lagrange factor (VBR)

This option uses ‘lambda’ units, but you may use the QP2LAMBDA constant to easily convert from ‘q’ units: 

  ffmpeg -i src.ext -lmax 21*QP2LAMBDA dst.ext
video_maximum_macroblock_scale(lambda)

Use maximum macroblock quantizer scale (VBR).

This option uses ‘lambda’ units, but you may use the QP2LAMBDA constant to easily convert from ‘q’ units: 

  ffmpeg -i src.ext -lmax 21*QP2LAMBDA dst.ext
video_maximum_quantizer_difference(diff)

Use maximum difference between the quantizer scales (VBR)

video_maximum_quantizer_scale(scale)

Use maximum video quantizer scale (VBR)

video_minimum_lagrange_factor(lambda)

Use minimum video lagrange factor (VBR)

This option uses ‘lambda’ units, but you may use the QP2LAMBDA constant to easily convert from ‘q’ units: 

  ffmpeg -i src.ext -lmax 21*QP2LAMBDA dst.ext
video_minimum_macroblock_scale(lambda)

Use minimum macroblock quantizer scale (VBR)

This option uses ‘lambda’ units, but you may use the QP2LAMBDA constant to easily convert from ‘q’ units: 

  ffmpeg -i src.ext -lmax 21*QP2LAMBDA dst.ext
video_minimum_quantizer_scale(scale)

Use minimum video quantizer scale (VBR)

video_quantizer_scale(scale)

Use fixed video quantizer scale (VBR).

video_quantizer_scale_blur(blur)

Use video quantizer scale blur (VBR) (range 0.0 - 1.0)

video_quantizer_scale_compression(compression)

Use video quantizer scale compression (VBR) (default 0.5). Constant of ratecontrol equation. Recommended range for default rc_eq: 0.0-1.0

[Validate]
